result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

Defendant Hassan Sheikh Noor Hassan appeared by video.  Attorney David Carl Bangert appeared by video for Hassan Sheikh Noor Hassan.  Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Status conference held. Defense reports that defendant will be entering into a DPA and needs a DPA hearing date. Case adjourned to Branch 1.
Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

Defendant Hassan Sheikh Noor Hassan appeared by video.  Attorney David Carl Bangert appeared by video for Hassan Sheikh Noor Hassan.  
Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Hearing held via Zoom.  Status conference held.  Parties are still in negotiations and request one more status date. Case is adjourned to Br. 1. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Hassan Sheikh Noor Hassan in court.  Attorney David Carl Bangert in court for Hassan Sheikh Noor Hassan.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. Hearing held via zoom. Attorney Bangert was recently retained and is requesting a status date. Case is adjourned in Branch 01.This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Hassan Sheikh Noor Hassan
Current: 3003 N 24th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 08-04-2022)
Prior: 4246 North 68Th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53216
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with M.J., C.J.C., and N.M.M.
Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Court ordered arrest warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Defendant Hassan Sheikh Noor Hassan in court.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 01.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant was given a referral to the Public Defender's Office. Defendant MAY be Public Defender eligible.  
The case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Br. 01.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Hassan Sheikh Noor Hassan not in court.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. Court makes a finding that there is a possible victim identified and stays the forfeiture order with restitution to be determined at close of case.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 8/3/22 @ 1p
